name: Electric Power Network Damage, Tornado
description: This analysis computes the damage of electric power network based on a tornado hazard.

inputs.name: Result Name
inputs.description: Specify the name of the result dataset

inputs.name: Electric Power Network
inputs.description: Search and/or create the electric power network to analyze.

inputs.name: Tornado Hazard
inputs.description: Search and/or create the tornado hazard that causes the damage

outputs.name: Electric Power Network Damage
outputs.description: Resulting damage in the power network after a hazard
